relation: Composer, Venkman, ChatZilla? So does this new build not contain Composer, Venkman and ChatZilla? Has their code been imported into HG with/without consulting them? What's the plan in that space? 2008-06-29 00:26

Gijs: We're importing ChatZilla, venkman, and in the future also DOMi from whatever repository they are using. Currently this is CVS, but I think it would be best for all of those to go for hg, using one repository per extension, just like what DOMi is working on, see bug 437064. Composer is a different story, it's currently part of mozilla-central, which we pull into the build tree using the client.py script (that is also used to pull in all those extensions). 2008-06-29 01:53
Repository Name Hey KaiRo, What about my suggestion for the combined repository: "Thundermonkey"? 2008-06-29 05:36
